keyword: how many calories in a turkey sandwich
title: How Many Calories in a Turkey Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a turkey sandwich, including protein, carbs, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Turkey Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard deli turkey (3 oz), two slices whole wheat bread, lettuce, tomato, mustard; no mayo or cheese.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, portion size, bread type, toppings, and preparation. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard turkey sandwich contains about 350 kcal and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use white bread instead of whole wheat

faqs.q: How many calories in a turkey sandwich with mayo?
faqs.a: Adding mayo increases it to about 440 kcal.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a turkey sandwich?
faqs.a: Typically 25 g from the turkey and bread.
Around 40 g carbs mainly from bread; opt for low-carb wraps to reduce.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in turkey sandwiches?
faqs.a: Deli turkey and bread contribute; choose low-sodium options to lower it.

faqs.q: How to make a lower calorie turkey sandwich?
faqs.a: Skip mayo, use mustard, add more veggies, and choose thin-sliced turkey for under 300 kcal.
